verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Saints and angels gather here
They are coming to this place
Heaven opens as we sing
and the glory's coming down

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Holy is the Lamb, Holy is the Lamb
The angels sing
Blessing and honour and glory to You oh God
to You oh God

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Holy Holy
Angels sing to the Lamb
